en.av_c1: Insertion Sort starts with the record in position 1.
en.av_c2: Since this is smaller than the value to its left, swap them.
en.av_c3: Now we are done with this record since it can't move further left.
en.av_c4: Now we are ready to process the record in position 2.
en.av_c5: We will compare it to the record in position 1.
en.av_c6: Since the record in position 2 is smaller, swap them.
en.av_c7: Now compare against the record in position 0.
en.av_c8: Since the record currently in position 1 is not smaller than the one in position 0, we are done with it.
en.av_c9: Now we are ready to process the record in position 3.
en.av_c10: We will compare it to the record in position 2.
en.av_c11: Since the record in position 2 is smaller, nothing changes and we are done with the record in position 3.
